item.description:
the food court at Super 88 in Alston offers a great selection of thai, vietnamese, japanese, indian, and other styles of food.

We will meet up for a dinner that allows everyone to get exactly what they want.... from indian curries, vietnamese sandwiches, bun, pho, pad thai, etc. and dont forget the bubble tea!!!

Once we meet and get a few tables we will spread out and order dinner and come back to chat and chow down. It will be a great way of hearing about the food the other's ordered. it might just inspire you the next time you are there.

There are great places in the area for dessert and for things to do afterwards if some people still want to go out.

PLEASE arrive on time. The point of a meetup to meet together and hang out. It is not productive if the group is waiting for several members. Arriving when everyone is done eating is not fun for you or the group to hang around waiting for you. email or text or call me if you are lost or running late 617 406 9696.

3 no shows and you are out of the group.
item.how_to_find_us: a meetup sign on a table.
item.name: Super 88 dinner meetup
